meanings.sent1: She received her wages at the end of the week.
meanings.sent2: His wages were enough to cover his living expenses.
meanings.sent3: The cat demanded her wages in treats for catching mice.
meanings.sent4: The sun's warmth was the wages for his hard work in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The sound of coins clinking together was the satisfying sound of wages earned.

meanings.definition: The amount of money earned for work done
meanings.sent1: The company increased their employees' wages this year.
meanings.sent2: His wages were higher this month due to overtime hours.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's wages for gathering nuts were stored in its cozy nest.
meanings.sent4: The laughter of children playing outside was the sweet wages of a job well done.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked bread was the delicious wages of her hard work in the kitchen.
